trans-unit.source: Supports updates of the current deployment programmatically, and handles on-demand downloading of files.
trans-unit.target: Støtter oppdateringer for gjeldende distribusjon programmatisk, og behandler behovsbetingede nedlasting av filer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan ikke arves.

trans-unit.source: You can configure your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application to check for updates and install them automatically through the `subscription` element of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Du kan konfigurere din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet skal se etter oppdateringer og installeres automatisk til den `subscription` element i manifestet distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: Some applications, however, need finer control over their updates.
trans-unit.target: Noen programmer, må imidlertid bedre kontroll over oppdateringer.

trans-unit.source: You may want to install required updates programmatically, and prompt users to install optional updates at their convenience.
trans-unit.target: Du bør installere obligatoriske oppdateringer programmatisk og be brukere installere valgfrie oppdateringer på deres foretrekker.

trans-unit.source: By turning off subscription updates in the deployment manifest, you can take complete control of your application's update policies.
trans-unit.target: Ved å deaktivere abonnementet oppdateringer i manifestet distribusjon, kan du utføre full kontroll over programmets oppdatere policyer.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use automatic subscription in conjunction with ApplicationDeployment, which enables [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] to update the application periodically, but uses ApplicationDeployment to download critical updates shortly after they are released.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke automatisk abonnementet sammen med ApplicationDeployment, som aktiverer [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] å oppdatere programmet regelmessig, men bruker ApplicationDeployment for å laste ned kritiske oppdateringer snart etter at de er utgitt.

trans-unit.source: You can test whether your deployment has an available update by using either the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A> or the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A> method; the latter method raises the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted> event on successful completion.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere om distribusjonen har en tilgjengelig oppdatering ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>metoden; seneste metoden hever den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted>hendelsen vellykket.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A> returns important information about the update, such as its version number and whether it is a required update for current users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A>Returnerer viktig informasjon om oppdateringen, for eksempel versjonsnummeret og om det er en nødvendig oppdatering for gjeldende brukere.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an update is available, you can install it by using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>; the latter method raises the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted> event after installation of the update is complete.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en oppdatering er tilgjengelig, kan du installere den ved hjelp av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A>eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>; metoden seneste opphøyer den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted>hendelsen etter installasjon av oppdateringen er fullført.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For large updates, you can receive progress notifications through the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged> and <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> events, and use the information in <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs> to notify the user of the download status.
trans-unit.target: For store oppdateringer, kan du motta pågår varsler gjennom den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>og <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>hendelser, og bruker informasjonen i <xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs>til å varsle bruker for Nedlastingsstatus.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: You can also use ApplicationDeployment to download large files and assemblies on demand.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke ApplicationDeployment å laste ned store filer og samlinger ved behov.

trans-unit.source: These files must be marked as "optional" within the deployment's application manifest so that they are not downloaded during installation.
trans-unit.target: Disse filene må være merket som "valgfri" i den distribusjonen programmanifest slik at de ikke er lastet ned i løpet av installasjonen.

trans-unit.source: You can download the files at any point during the application's duration by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A> or the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned filene når som helst under programmets varighet ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can download assemblies before they are loaded into memory by supplying an event handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event on the <xref:System.AppDomain> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned samlinger før de er lastet inn i minnet ved å oppgi en hendelsesbehandling for <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>hendelse på <xref:System.AppDomain>klasse.</xref:System.AppDomain> </xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [gjennomgang: nedlasting av samlinger ved behov med den ClickOnce distribusjon API Designer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you update a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application while the application is running, the user will not see the updates until you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>, which will close the current running instance of the application and immediately restart it.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis du oppdaterer en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet mens programmet kjører, brukeren ser ikke oppdateringene før du kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>metoden av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>som vil lukke den gjeldende kjørende forekomsten av programmet og omstart det.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>

trans-unit.source: ApplicationDeployment has no public constructor; you obtain instances of the class within a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application through the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationDeployment har ingen offentlig konstruktør; du få forekomster av klassen i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet via den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A>

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A> property to verify that the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Du bruker den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>til å bekrefte at dette programmet er en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>

trans-unit.source: ApplicationDeployment supports checking for updates and downloading updated files asynchronously by using the new [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), which exposes completion callbacks as class events.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationDeployment støtter ser etter oppdateringer og laste ned oppdaterte filene asynkront ved hjelp av den nye [hendelsen kodebasert asynkrone mønsteret oversikt](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), som viser fullført tilbakeringinger som klassen hendelser.

trans-unit.source: ApplicationDeployment starts and manages the threads for you, and calls your application back on the correct UI thread.
trans-unit.target: ApplicationDeployment starter administrerer tråder for deg og kaller programmet tilbake på riktig UI-tråden.

trans-unit.source: Through this class, you can update without locking up the application, so that the user can continue working while the update installs.
trans-unit.target: I denne klassen, kan du oppdatere uten å låse opp programmet, slik at brukeren kan fortsette å arbeide mens oppdateringene installeres.

trans-unit.source: If the user must stop all work while an update takes place, consider using the synchronous methods instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis brukeren må stopper alle jobb når en oppdatering utføres, kan du vurdere å bruke metodene synkron i stedet.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Performing asynchronous updates requires that your application import both the <xref:System.Deployment.Application> and <xref:System.ComponentModel> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Utfører asynkrone oppdateringer krever at programmet importerer både den <xref:System.Deployment.Application>og <xref:System.ComponentModel>navneområder.</xref:System.ComponentModel> </xref:System.Deployment.Application>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URL used to launch the deployment manifest of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter URL-adressen brukes til å starte manifestet distribusjon av programmet.

trans-unit.source: This property will work in both fully trusted and partially trusted applications.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen fungerer i både fullstendig klarerte og delvis klarerte programmer.

trans-unit.source: A zero-length string if the `TrustUrlParameters` property in the deployment manifest is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, or if the user has supplied a UNC to open the deployment or has opened it locally.
trans-unit.target: En tom streng hvis den `TrustUrlParameters` egenskapen i distribusjonen manifestet <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, eller hvis brukeren har sendt en UNC-BANE for å åpne distribusjonen eller har åpnet den lokalt.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the return value is the full URL used to launch the application, including any parameters.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, er returverdien fullstendig URL-adressen brukes til å starte programmet, inkludert alle parametere.

trans-unit.source: Performs the same operation as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>, but returns extended information about the available update.
trans-unit.target: Utfører samme operasjon som <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>, men returnerer utvidet informasjon om oppdateringen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: The CheckForDetailedUpdate method lets synchronous callers get the same extended information that asynchronous callers get using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CheckForDetailedUpdate kan synkron brukere hente samme utvidet informasjon om at asynkrone brukere få bruker <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs>klasse.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.UpdateCheckInfo"></xref> for the available update.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.UpdateCheckInfo"> </xref> til oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: The current application is either not configured to support updates, or there is another update check operation already in progress.
trans-unit.target: Dette programmet er enten ikke konfigurert til å støtte oppdateringer, eller det er en annen kontroller for oppdateringen allerede pågår.

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke lastes ned distribusjon manifestet.

trans-unit.source: This exception will appear in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*> property of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket vises i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>for den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen distribusjon er skadet.

trans-unit.source: Regenerate the application's manifest before you attempt to deploy this application to users.
trans-unit.target: Lag den programmanifest før du prøver å distribuere dette programmet til brukere.

trans-unit.source: This exception will appear in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*> property of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket vises i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>for den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>

trans-unit.source: Performs the same operation as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>, but returns extended information about the available update.
trans-unit.target: Utfører samme operasjon som <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>, men returnerer utvidet informasjon om oppdateringen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the update will be applied silently and no dialog box will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>oppdateringen gjelder stille og ingen dialogboks vises.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.UpdateCheckInfo"></xref> for the available update.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.UpdateCheckInfo"> </xref> til oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: Checks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*> to determine whether a new update is available.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>å finne ut om en ny oppdatering er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>

trans-unit.source: The CheckForUpdate method compares the version of the currently installed deployment with the version specified in the deployment manifest found at <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CheckForUpdate sammenligner versjon av installerte distribusjonen med versjonen som ble angitt i distribusjonen manifestet på <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the version on the server is different from the installed version, it returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis versjonen på serveren er ulik den installerte versjonen, returneres `true`.

trans-unit.source: This method will block until the check has completed.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden blokkerer til sjekken er fullført.

trans-unit.source: To check for an update asynchronously, use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: For å se etter oppdateringer asynkront, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If CheckForUpdate discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis CheckForUpdate oppdager at en oppdatering er tilgjengelig, og brukeren velger ikke å installere det [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] blir du bedt om brukeren som en oppdatering er tilgjengelig neste gang programmet kjøres.

trans-unit.source: There is no way to disable this prompting.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å deaktivere denne spørsmål.

trans-unit.source: (If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.)
trans-unit.target: (Hvis programmet er en nødvendig oppdatering [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] vil installere den uten å spørre.)

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a new update is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en ny oppdatering er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] throws this exception immediately if you call the CheckForUpdate method while an update is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]oppstår dette unntaket øyeblikkelig hvis du kalle metoden CheckForUpdate når en oppdatering pågår allerede.

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke lastes ned distribusjon manifestet.

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen distribusjon er skadet.

trans-unit.source: You will likely need to redeploy the application to fix this problem.
trans-unit.target: Sannsynlig må du distribuere programmet til å løse problemet.

trans-unit.source: Checks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*> to determine whether a new update is available.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>å finne ut om en ny oppdatering er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the update will be applied silently and no dialog box will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>oppdateringen gjelder stille og ingen dialogboks vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a new update is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en ny oppdatering er tilgjengelig. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Checks <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*> asynchronously to determine whether a new update is available.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>asynkront for å finne ut om en ny oppdatering er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation*>

trans-unit.source: CheckForUpdateAsync returns immediately and starts a separate thread for downloading the updated application.
trans-unit.target: CheckForUpdateAsync returnerer umiddelbart og starter en egen tråd for å laste ned den oppdaterte applikasjonen.

trans-unit.source: When the method completes or is canceled, it raises the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: Når metoden er fullført, eller er avbrutt den opphøyer den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted>

trans-unit.source: You can use <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> in this event handler to determine whether the operation was canceled, or if an exception was raised during update.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>i denne hendelsesbehandlingen å avgjøre om operasjonen ble avbrutt, eller hvis det oppstod et unntak under oppdateringen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel an asynchronous update by calling <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsyncCancel%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan avbryte en asynkron oppdatering ved å kalle <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsyncCancel%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A> discovers that an update is available, and the user chooses not to install it, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will prompt the user that an update is available the next time the application is run.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>oppdager at en oppdatering er tilgjengelig, og brukeren velger ikke å installere det [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] blir du bedt om brukeren som en oppdatering er tilgjengelig neste gang programmet kjøres.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to disable this prompting.
trans-unit.target: Det er ikke mulig å deaktivere denne spørsmål.

trans-unit.source: (If the application is a required update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will install it without prompting.)
trans-unit.target: (Hvis programmet er en nødvendig oppdatering [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] vil installere den uten å spørre.)

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] throws this exception immediately if you call the CheckForUpdateAsync method while an update is already in progress.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]oppstår dette unntaket øyeblikkelig hvis du kalle metoden CheckForUpdateAsync når en oppdatering pågår allerede.

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest cannot be downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke lastes ned distribusjon manifestet.

trans-unit.source: This exception appears in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*> property of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket vises i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>for den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Manifestfilen distribusjon er skadet.

trans-unit.source: You will likely need to redeploy the application to fix this problem.
trans-unit.target: Sannsynlig må du distribuere programmet til å løse problemet.

trans-unit.source: This exception appears in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*> property of the <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket vises i den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>for den <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error*>

trans-unit.source: Cancels the asynchronous update check.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter asynkrone update-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: Use this method to cancel an update check initiated with the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne metoden for å avbryte en Søk etter oppdateringer med den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method will not cancel any background update that may already be in progress, such as an update started as part of a subscription.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden avbrytes bakgrunnen oppdateringer som allerede er i gang, slik som en oppdatering startet som en del av et abonnement.

trans-unit.source: For more information about subscriptions, see [Choosing a ClickOnce Update Strategy](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon om abonnementer, se [å velge en ClickOnce oppdateringen fremgangsmåte](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*> has completed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*>er fullført.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs> class will tell you, among other things, the version of the update, how large the update is, and whether the available update is required or optional.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs>klassen fortelle deg, blant annet versjon av oppdateringen, hvor stor oppdateringen er og om oppdateringen er obligatorisk eller valgfri.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.CheckForUpdateCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a progress update is available on a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*> call.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en pågår-oppdatering er tilgjengelig på en <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*>kall.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync*>

trans-unit.source: CheckForUpdateProgressChanged reports on the download status of the application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: CheckForUpdateProgressChanged rapporter på Last Nedlastingsstatus programmets distribusjon manifest.

trans-unit.source: This can be important information for users who are downloading the deployment over slow network connections.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være viktig informasjon for brukere som laster ned distribusjonen over treg nettverkstilkoblinger.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Returns the current <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"></xref> for this deployment.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer gjeldende <xref href="System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment"> </xref> for denne distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: You cannot create instances of <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment> directly in your application; you must retrieve a valid instance through the CurrentDeployment property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette forekomster av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>direkte i programmets; må du hente en gyldig forekomst via egenskapen CurrentDeployment.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentDeployment static property is valid only from within an application that was deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen CurrentDeployment statisk er gyldig bare fra et program som ble distribuert ved hjelp av [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Attempts to call this property from non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] applications will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Forsøk på å kalle denne egenskapen fra ikke -[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmer vil Iverksett et unntak.

trans-unit.source: If you are developing an application that may or may not be deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A> property to test whether the current program is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du utvikler et program som kan eller kan ikke bli distribuert ved hjelp av [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)], bruk av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>til å teste om gjeldende program er en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.IsNetworkDeployed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The current deployment.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: You attempted to call this static property from a non-[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Du forsøkte å kalle statisk egenskapen fra en ikke -[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the deployment for the current running instance of the application.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonen av distribusjonen for den gjeldende forekomsten som kjører for programmet.

trans-unit.source: CurrentVersion will differ from <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdatedVersion%2A> if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: CurrentVersion varierer fra <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdatedVersion%2A>Hvis en ny er installert, men du har ennå ikke kalt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdatedVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine if you should restart the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis distribusjon manifestfilen er konfigurert til å utføre automatiske oppdateringer, kan du sammenligne disse to verdier for å finne ut om du skal starte programmet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: The current deployment version.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende versjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] data directory.
trans-unit.target: Henter banen til den [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] datakatalogen.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the path to the application's data directory on the local disk.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder banen til programmets datakatalogen på den lokale disken.

trans-unit.source: Downloads a set of optional files on demand.
trans-unit.target: Laster ned et sett med valgfri filer ved behov.

trans-unit.source: In a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, the files marked "optional" in the application manifest are not downloaded during initialization or update.
trans-unit.target: I en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet filer som er merket som "valgfri" i programmanifestet ikke er lastet ned under initialisering av eller oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: You can use the DownloadFileGroup method to download all of the files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke DownloadFileGroup-metoden til å laste ned filer som hører til en navngitt gruppe ved behov, slik at de ikke så nettverksressurser og diskplass før du er sikker på at brukeren krever dem..

trans-unit.source: For example, certain users may need to use a data analysis package included in your application on a daily basis, while other users may never invoke it.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte brukere kan for eksempel må bruke en pakke analysis inkluderes i programmets daglig, mens andre brukere ikke kan aktivere den.

trans-unit.source: To use an assembly you have downloaded with DownloadFileGroup, you attach an event listener to the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event on the <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en samling som du har lastet ned med DownloadFileGroup, koble en hendelse lytter <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>hendelsen <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>.</xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see =[Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API Using the Designer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se =[gjennomgang: nedlasting av samlinger ved behov med den ClickOnce distribusjon API Designer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: All files are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application cache and are therefore isolated to the current version of the application.
trans-unit.target: Alle filer som lastes ned til det [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet hurtigbufferen, og er derfor isolerte til den gjeldende versjonen av programmet.

trans-unit.source: Let's say that after an application downloads a file group, the user installs a new version of the application, but later reverts to the previous version of the application.
trans-unit.target: La oss si at når et program ned en filgruppe, brukeren installerer en ny versjon av programmet, men senere går tilbake til forrige versjon av programmet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the previous version will still have the copies of the files it originally downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Den forrige versjonen vil fremdeles ha kopier av filene den opprinnelig ble lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessing data files, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tilgang til dataene i [tilgang til lokale og eksterne Data i ClickOnce-programmer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: DownloadFileGroup works in partially trusted applications, that is, in any [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application running with restricted permission.
trans-unit.target: DownloadFileGroup fungerer i delvis klarerte programmer som er i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] kjører med begrenset tilgang.

trans-unit.source: However, if you attempt to load assemblies dynamically, your application will require full trust.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å laste samlinger dynamisk, vil programmet, krever fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: On-demand downloading of data files is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: På forespørsel nedlasting av datafiler støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: Your application will not be responsive to user input until the DownloadFileGroup method returns.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er ikke svarer til brukerinndata til metoden DownloadFileGroup returnerer.

trans-unit.source: If you need to download files without interrupting the user's workflow, use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil laste ned filer uten å forstyrre brukerens arbeidsflyten for bruk av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot download a single file by its file name alone.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned en enkeltfil av navnet på filen alene.

trans-unit.source: To download a single file, assign it a group name in your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment and download the group using this method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned en enkeltfil tilordne den et gruppenavn i din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon og Last ned gruppe med denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The named group of files to download.
trans-unit.target: Den navngitte gruppen filer å laste ned.

trans-unit.source: All files marked "optional" in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application require a group name.
trans-unit.target: Alle filer merket "valgfri" i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet krever et gruppenavn.

trans-unit.source: The groupName parameter is null or zero-length.
trans-unit.target: Den groupName parameteren er null eller tom.

trans-unit.source: Downloads, on demand, a set of optional files in the background.
trans-unit.target: Laster ned, ved behov, et sett med valgfri filer i bakgrunnen.

trans-unit.source: In a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, the files marked "optional" in the application manifest are not downloaded during initialization or update.
trans-unit.target: I en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet filer som er merket som "valgfri" i programmanifestet ikke er lastet ned under initialisering av eller oppdatering.

trans-unit.source: You can use the DownloadFileGroupAsync method to download all of the files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke DownloadFileGroupAsync-metoden til å laste ned filer som hører til en navngitt gruppe ved behov, slik at de ikke så nettverksressurser og diskplass før du er sikker på at brukeren krever dem..

trans-unit.source: This approach works not only for static files, but also for assemblies that an application may or may not require.
trans-unit.target: Denne fremgangsmåten fungerer ikke bare for statiske filer, men også for samlinger som et program kan eller kan ikke kreve.

trans-unit.source: For example, certain users may need to use a data analysis package included in your application on a daily basis, while other users may never invoke it.
trans-unit.target: Enkelte brukere kan for eksempel må bruke en pakke analysis inkluderes i programmets daglig, mens andre brukere ikke kan aktivere den.

trans-unit.source: To download assemblies on demand, attach an event listener to the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event on the <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil laste ned samlinger ved behov, legge ved en hendelse lytter <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>hendelse på <xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A>.</xref:System.AppDomain.CurrentDomain%2A> </xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>

trans-unit.source: For an example, see [Walkthrough: Downloading Assemblies on Demand with the ClickOnce Deployment API](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du for eksempel se [gjennomgang: nedlasting av samlinger ved behov med ClickOnce distribusjon APIen](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: All assemblies are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application cache.
trans-unit.target: Alle samlinger lastes ned til det [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] hurtigbufferen.

trans-unit.source: All static files are downloaded to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application's data directory and are therefore isolated to the current version of the application.
trans-unit.target: Alle statiske filer lastes ned til det [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmets datamappen og er derfor isolerte til den gjeldende versjonen av programmet.

trans-unit.source: Let's say that after an application downloads a file group, the user installs a new version of the application, but later reverts to the previous version of the application.
trans-unit.target: La oss si at når et program ned en filgruppe, brukeren installerer en ny versjon av programmet, men senere går tilbake til forrige versjon av programmet.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the previous version will still have the copies of the files it originally downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Den forrige versjonen vil fremdeles ha kopier av filene den opprinnelig ble lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessing static files, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om tilgang til statiske filer [tilgang til lokale og eksterne Data i ClickOnce-programmer](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: You can download multiple file groups simultaneously using <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned flere filgrupper samtidig med <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can distinguish among them by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A> property of the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs> class, which is passed to the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan skille mellom dem ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>for den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>klassen som er sendt til den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs.Group%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to pass more complex state, you can use <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> to pass in a `state` object.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil sende sterkere tilstand, kan du bruke <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>skal sendes i en `state` objektet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A> works in partially trusted applications, that is, in any [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application running with restricted permission.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>fungerer i delvis klarerte programmer som er i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] kjører med begrenset tilgang.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if you are attempting to load assemblies dynamically, your application will require full trust.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du prøver å laste samlinger dynamisk, vil programmet, krever fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned en enkeltfil tilordne den et gruppenavn i din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon og Last ned gruppe med denne metoden.

trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte en asynkron nedlasting, kan du kalle den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsyncCancel%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: The named group of files to download.
trans-unit.target: Den navngitte gruppen filer å laste ned.

trans-unit.source: All files marked "optional" in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application require a group name.
trans-unit.target: Alle filer merket "valgfri" i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet krever et gruppenavn.

trans-unit.source: The groupName parameter is null or zero-length.

trans-unit.source: You cannot initiate more than one download of groupName at a time.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ikke opprette mer enn én nedlasting av groupName om gangen.

trans-unit.source: Downloads, on demand, a set of optional files in the background, and passes a piece of application state to the event callbacks.
trans-unit.target: Ned et sett med valgfri filer i bakgrunnen ved behov, og sender en del av programtilstanden til tilbakeringinger for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: In a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, the files marked "optional" in the application manifest are not downloaded during initialization or update.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> method to download all of the files belonging to a named group on demand, so that they do not consume network resources and disk space until you are sure the user requires them.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>metode for å laste ned alle filer som hører til en navngitt gruppe ved behov, slik at de ikke så nettverksressurser og diskplass før du er sikker på at brukeren krever dem..</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can download multiple file groups simultaneously by using the DownloadFileGroupAsync method.
