trans-unit.source: All files marked "optional" in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application require a group name.
trans-unit.target: Alle filer merket "valgfri" i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet krever et gruppenavn.

trans-unit.source: groupName cannot be .
trans-unit.target: groupNamekan ikke være .

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the main application thread when a file download is complete.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer i den primære programmet tråden når en filnedlastingen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The DownloadFileGroupCompleted event is called on the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DownloadFileGroupCompleted kalles i den primære programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback.
trans-unit.target: Det er trygt å kalle programmets Windows Forms Kontroller direkte i denne tilbakeringing tråd.

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> supplied to this callback.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>angitt for denne tilbakeringing.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `null`, the download was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about the installation failure through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `null`, nedlastingen ble fullført; hvis den ikke `null`installasjonen mislyktes, og du finner mer informasjon om feil under installasjonen via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when status information is available on a file download operation initiated by a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når statusinformasjon er tilgjengelig på Last ned en filoperasjonen startet av et kall til <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged event is called on the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen DownloadFileGroupProgressChanged kalles i den primære programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: It is thread safe to call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback.
trans-unit.target: Det er trygt å kalle programmets Windows Forms Kontroller direkte i denne tilbakeringing tråd.

trans-unit.source: Use the information supplied in <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs> to communicate progress information to your users.
trans-unit.target: Bruk informasjonen i <xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>kommunisere informasjon om fremdrift til brukerne dine.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Checks whether the named file group has already been downloaded to the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Kontrollerer om den navngitte filgruppen er allerede lastet ned til klientdatamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: IsFileGroupDownloaded works in a partially trusted application without any security demands.
trans-unit.target: IsFileGroupDownloaded fungerer i en delvis klarert programmet uten noen krav for sikkerhet.

trans-unit.source: When you update an application, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] copies any on-demand data files from the previous version into the new version's data directory.
trans-unit.target: Når du oppdaterer en applikasjon [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] overfører datafiler etter behov fra den forrige versjonen i datakatalogen for den nye versjonen.

trans-unit.source: If you download a new version of these files, you should remove any data you want to keep from the old version and move it into the new version.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du laster ned en ny versjon av disse filene, bør du fjerne alle dataene du vil beholde fra den gamle versjonen og flytt dem til den nye versjonen.

trans-unit.source: The named group of files to download.
trans-unit.target: Den navngitte gruppen filer å laste ned.

trans-unit.source: All files marked "optional" in a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application require a group name.
trans-unit.target: Alle filer merket "valgfri" i en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet krever et gruppenavn.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the file group has already been downloaded for the current version of this application; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis filgruppen er allerede lastet ned for den gjeldende versjonen av dette programmet. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a new version of the application has been installed, and the new version has not added, removed, or altered files in the file group, IsFileGroupDownloaded returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en ny versjon av programmet er installert, og den nye versjonen er ikke lagt til, fjernet eller endre filer i filgruppen, IsFileGroupDownloaded returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: groupName is not a file group defined in the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: groupNameer ikke en filgruppe som er definert i programmanifestet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this is the first time this application has run on the client computer.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette er første gang dette programmet ble kjørt på klientdatamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: Use IsFirstRun to determine whether you need to perform any one-time initialization operations the first time your application runs.
trans-unit.target: Bruk IsFirstRun til å finne ut om du trenger å utføre noen engangspassord initialisering operasjoner første gang programmet kjøres.

trans-unit.source: Do not assume that a IsFirstRun setting of `true` indicates that this instance of an application is the first one to show its user interface to the user.
trans-unit.target: Ikke tar som IsFirstRun innstillingen `true` indikerer at denne forekomsten av et program er den første som skal vises brukergrensesnittet for brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Due to the way the system schedules processes, one instance of the application may have its IsFirstRun property set to `true`, but another instance may be the first to render on the screen.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av måten systemet planlegger som har én forekomst av programmet egenskapen IsFirstRun satt til `true`, men en annen forekomst kan være først til å gjengi på skjermen.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is reset whenever the user upgrades from one version to the next.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen er tilbakestilt når en bruker oppgraderer fra en versjon til neste.

trans-unit.source: If you want to perform an operation only the very first time any version of the application is run, you will need to perform an additional test, such as checking for the existence of a file you created the first time, or storing a flag using **Application Settings**.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil utføre en operasjon bare den første gang en versjon av programmet kjøres, må du utføre en ekstra test, for eksempel kontrollerer om en fil du opprettet første gang, eller lagre en flagget bruker **programinnstillinger**.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this version of the application has never run on the client computer before; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis denne versjonen av programmet har aldri kjører på klientdatamaskinen før; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om dette programmet er en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet.

trans-unit.source: If you want your application to run both inside and outside of a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment (for example, if you need to debug your application on the local computer before deploying it), test IsNetworkDeployed before accessing the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil at programmet til å kjøre begge innvendig og utenfor en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon (for eksempel hvis du vil feilsøke programmet på den lokale datamaskinen før du distribuerer den), teste IsNetworkDeployed før du åpner den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentDeployment%2A>

trans-unit.source: IsNetworkDeployed will return `true` regardless of whether the application is installed or hosted online, and regardless of whether it was installed from a Web site, file share, or CD-ROM.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller IsNetworkDeployed `true` uansett om programmet installeres eller vertsbaserte online, og uavhengig om det er installert fra et webområde, filressurs eller CD-ROM.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis dette er en [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and the time [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] last checked for an application update.
trans-unit.target: Henter datoen og klokkeslettet [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] ble sist kontrollert for en appoppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application can be configured for subscription updates.
trans-unit.target: En [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet kan konfigureres for abonnementet oppdateringer.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] polls an application's deployment location automatically at intervals defined in the deployment manifest, and determines whether there is an update available.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] spørres et program distribusjon plassering automatisk i intervaller som er definert i manifestet distribusjon, og bestemmer om en oppdatering er tilgjengelig.

trans-unit.source: TimeOfLastUpdateCheck returns the time of the last update check regardless of whether it was initiated by a subscription or by an explicit check using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A>, or <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: TimeOfLastUpdateCheck returnerer klokkeslettet for den siste oppdatering sjekken uavhengig om det ble startet ved et abonnement eller en eksplisitt kontroll av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A>, <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A>, eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.Update%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForDetailedUpdate%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdateAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CheckForUpdate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no update check has been performed since the application was installed, TimeOfLastUpdateCheck returns the installation time.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen Søk etter oppdateringer er utført fordi programmet ble installert, returnerer TimeOfLastUpdateCheck installasjonstid.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> of the last update check.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.DateTime>på den siste oppdatering sjekken.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Starts a synchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.
trans-unit.target: Starter en synkron nedlasting og installasjon av den nyeste versjonen av dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>, and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: Et program anses oppdateres når du publiserer en ny versjon av programmet til plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>, og versjonsnummeret i programmets distribusjon manifestfilen er større enn versjonsnummeret for applikasjonen som er installert på datamaskinen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Update call will block until the update has been downloaded to the client computer and installed into the [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] cache; during this time, the application will not be responsive to the user.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringen kallet vil blokkere før oppdateringen har blitt lastet ned på klientdatamaskinen og installert i den [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] bufre; under replikeringen programmet blir ikke svarer til brukeren.

trans-unit.source: If you want to maintain application responsiveness or display a progress report during download, use the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde programmet respons eller vise en fremdriftsrapport under nedlastingen, bruk av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>metoden i stedet.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Update downloads all of the files that are not marked as "optional" in the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringen lastes ned alle filene som ikke er merket som "valgfri" i programmanifestet.

trans-unit.source: You can download optional files on demand by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A> or the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned valgfrie filer på forespørsel ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] may already be updating the application automatically when you call the Update method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]kan allerede være oppdatere programmet automatisk når du kaller Update-metoden. Hvis dette skjer, throw kall til denne metoden <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har oppdatert én eller flere filer i distribusjonen, men du ikke har oppdatert din programmanifest, får du en <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, redeploying your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application solves this problem.
trans-unit.target: De fleste av tiden distribuere din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] programmet løser dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing.
trans-unit.target: Du mottar dette unntaket også hvis en fellesnøkkel signatur på en distribusjon manifest eller programmanifest er ugyldig eller mangler.

trans-unit.source: An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application.
trans-unit.target: En oppdatering kan be om et høyere nivå av stoler på den lokale datamaskinen enn den forrige versjonen av programmet.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker klarert programdistribusjon, undersøker common language runtime (CLR) klarering transportbehandling for distribusjon manifestet for å finne ut om den inneholder en ugyldig klarering-lisens.

trans-unit.source: If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis distribusjon manifestet ikke inneholder en gyldig klarering lisens [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stopper installasjonen og oppstår <xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>

trans-unit.source: The Update method will never display a prompt asking the user whether they want to grant the application permission to run.
trans-unit.target: Update-metoden viser aldri en melding som spør brukeren om de vil gi programmet tillatelse til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an application has been updated; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis et program har blitt oppdatert; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The local computer did not grant the application the permission level it requested to execute.
trans-unit.target: Den lokale datamaskinen ikke gi programmet tillatelsesnivå den bedt om å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: Your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon er skadet.

trans-unit.source: For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see [Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Tips om hvordan du diagnostisere og løse problemet, kan du se [feilsøking ClickOnce distribusjoner](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.
trans-unit.target: Ny distribusjonen kan ikke lastes ned fra plassering på nettverket.

trans-unit.source: The application is currently being updated.
trans-unit.target: Programmet oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Starts an asynchronous download and installation of the latest version of this application.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron nedlasting og installasjon av den nyeste versjonen av dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: An application is considered updated when you publish a new version of the application to the location specified by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>, and the version number in the application's deployment manifest is greater than the version number of the application currently installed on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: Et program anses oppdateres når du publiserer en ny versjon av programmet til plasseringen angitt av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>, og versjonsnummeret i programmets distribusjon manifestfilen er større enn versjonsnummeret for applikasjonen som er installert på datamaskinen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateLocation%2A>

trans-unit.source: While downloading the update, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged> event handler on the main application thread to inform you of the status of the download.
trans-unit.target: Under nedlasting av oppdateringen [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] kan øke den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>hendelsesbehandlingen i den primære programmet tråden å informere om statusen til nedlastingen.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateProgressChanged>

trans-unit.source: When the asynchronous update finishes or encounters an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] will raise the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted> event on the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: Når den asynkrone oppdateringen er fullført eller oppstår et unntak [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] vil øke det <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted>hendelsen i den primære programmet-tråden.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted>

trans-unit.source: Examine the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> supplied to this event to determine whether the update succeeded.
trans-unit.target: Undersøk den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>angitt for denne hendelsen for å finne ut om oppdateringen er fullført.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: If UpdateAsync throws an exception, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] calls <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted> and sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> to the exception that was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak for UpdateAsync [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] kall <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted>og angir den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>for <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>unntak som oppstod.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateCompleted>

trans-unit.source: UpdateAsync will download all files in a deployment not marked as "optional" in the application manifest.
trans-unit.target: UpdateAsync vil laste ned alle filene i en distribusjon ikke er merket som "valgfri" i programmanifestet.

trans-unit.source: You can download optional files on demand by using the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A> or the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Du kan laste ned valgfrie filer på forespørsel ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>eller <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A>metode.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroupAsync%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.DownloadFileGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] may already be updating the application automatically when you call the UpdateAsync method; if that happens, calls to this method will throw an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]kan allerede være oppdatere programmet automatisk når du kaller UpdateAsync-metoden. Hvis dette skjer, throw kall til denne metoden <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: If you have updated one or more files in your deployment, but you have not refreshed your application manifest, you will receive an <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du har oppdatert én eller flere filer i distribusjonen, men du ikke har oppdatert din programmanifest, får du en <xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.InvalidDeploymentException>

trans-unit.source: Most of the time, rebuilding your application manifest solves this problem.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis, løser bygger din programmanifest dette problemet.

trans-unit.source: You will also receive this exception if a public-key signature on a deployment manifest or application manifest is invalid or missing.
trans-unit.target: Du mottar dette unntaket også hvis en fellesnøkkel signatur på en distribusjon manifest eller programmanifest er ugyldig eller mangler.

trans-unit.source: An update may request a higher level of trust on the local computer than the previous version of the application.
trans-unit.target: En oppdatering kan be om et høyere nivå av stoler på den lokale datamaskinen enn den forrige versjonen av programmet.

trans-unit.source: If the application uses Trusted Application Deployment, the common language runtime (CLR) trust manager examines the deployment manifest to determine whether it contains a valid trust license.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet bruker klarert programdistribusjon, undersøker common language runtime (CLR) klarering transportbehandling for distribusjon manifestet for å finne ut om den inneholder en ugyldig klarering-lisens.

trans-unit.source: If the deployment manifest does not contain a valid trust license, [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stops the installation and throws a <xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis distribusjon manifestet ikke inneholder en gyldig klarering lisens [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] stopper installasjonen og oppstår <xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.TrustNotGrantedException>

trans-unit.source: UpdateAsync will never display a prompt asking the user if they want to grant the application permission to run.
trans-unit.target: UpdateAsync viser aldri en melding som spør brukeren om de vil gi programmet tillatelse til å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: The local computer did not grant this application the permission level it requested to execute.
trans-unit.target: Den lokale datamaskinen ikke gi dette programmet tillatelsesnivå den bedt om å kjøre.

trans-unit.source: Your [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] deployment is corrupted.
trans-unit.target: Din [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] distribusjon er skadet.

trans-unit.source: For tips on how to diagnose and correct the problem, see [Troubleshooting ClickOnce Deployments](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Tips om hvordan du diagnostisere og løse problemet, kan du se [feilsøking ClickOnce distribusjoner](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The new deployment could not be downloaded from its location on the network.
trans-unit.target: Ny distribusjonen kan ikke lastes ned fra plassering på nettverket.

trans-unit.source: Cancels an asynchronous update initiated by <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter en asynkron oppdatering startet av <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>

trans-unit.source: UpdateAsyncCancel only cancels an update initiated by a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>; it does not cancel an update started as part of a subscription.
trans-unit.target: UpdateAsyncCancel avbryter bare en oppdatering startet av et kall til <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>; den ikke avbryte en oppdatering startet som en del av et abonnement.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has finished upgrading the application as the result of a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] er ferdig med å oppgradere programmet som et resultat av et kall til <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateCompleted event is called on the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen UpdateCompleted kalles i den primære programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe programmets Windows Forms Kontroller direkte i denne tilbakeringing uten å utløse et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> supplied to this callback.
trans-unit.target: Se den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>angitt for denne tilbakeringing.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is `null`, the installation was successful; if it is not `null`, the installation did not succeed, and you can find more information about this installation failure through the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `null`, installasjonen var vellykket; hvis den ikke `null`installasjonen mislyktes, og du finner mer informasjon om denne installasjonsfeil via den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the update has been downloaded, you will need to call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> to use the newer version of the application.
trans-unit.target: Når oppdateringen er lastet ned, må du kalle den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>-metoden på den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>å bruke den nyeste versjonen av programmet.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the installation of the update was canceled by a call to <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsyncCancel%2A>, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> class will be `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis installasjonen av oppdateringen ble avbrutt av et kall til <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsyncCancel%2A>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs>klassen blir `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Cancelled%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsyncCancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: To use this event handler, your application must import both the <xref:System.Deployment.Application> and <xref:System.ComponentModel> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke denne hendelsesbehandlingen programmet må importere både den <xref:System.Deployment.Application>og <xref:System.ComponentModel>navneområder.</xref:System.ComponentModel> </xref:System.Deployment.Application>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the full name of the application after it has been updated.
trans-unit.target: Henter det fullstendige navnet på programmet etter har blitt oppdatert.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the full name of the application.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.String>som inneholder hele navnet på programmet.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the update that was recently downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Henter versjonen av oppdateringen ble lastet ned nylig.

trans-unit.source: UpdatedVersion differs from <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A> if a new update has been installed but you have not yet called <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A> on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>.
trans-unit.target: UpdatedVersion er forskjellig fra <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>Hvis en ny er installert, men du har ennå ikke kalles <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A>på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Restart%2A> </xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application's deployment manifest is configured to perform automatic updates, you can compare these two values to determine whether you should restart the application.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmets distribusjon manifest er konfigurert til å utføre automatiske oppdateringer, kan du sammenligner disse to verdier for å finne ut om du må starte programmet på nytt.

trans-unit.source: If the application has not been updated, UpdatedVersion returns the same value as <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis programmet ikke er oppdatert, returnerer UpdatedVersion samme verdi som <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.CurrentVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Version> describing the version of the update.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Version>som beskriver versjon av oppdateringen.</xref:System.Version>

trans-unit.source: Gets the Web site or file share from which this application updates itself.
trans-unit.target: Henter webområdet eller filressurs som dette programmet oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: UpdateLocation may be different from the Web site used to download the application initially if the application's deployment is configured to use update redirection.
trans-unit.target: UpdateLocation kan være forskjellig fra webområdet brukes til å laste ned programmet opprinnelig Hvis programmets distribusjon er konfigurert til å bruke oppdateringen omadressering.

trans-unit.source: This value can be changed only in the application's deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien kan bare endres programmanifest mellom distribusjonen.

trans-unit.source: The update path, expressed as an HTTP, HTTPS, or file URL; or as a Windows network file path (UNC).
trans-unit.target: Oppdateringsbanen uttrykt som en HTTP, HTTPS eller URL-adresse for fil. eller som en Windows nettverksbane filen (UNC-BANE).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] has new status information for an update operation initiated by calling the <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/add/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] har ny informasjon om behandlingsstatus for en oppdateringsoperasjon startet ved å kalle den <xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>metoden.</xref:System.Deployment.Application.ApplicationDeployment.UpdateAsync*>

trans-unit.source: The UpdateProgressChanged event is called on the main application thread.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsen UpdateProgressChanged kalles i den primære programmet-tråden.

trans-unit.source: You may call your application's Windows Forms controls directly within this callback without triggering an exception.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ringe programmets Windows Forms Kontroller direkte i denne tilbakeringing uten å utløse et unntak.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
